data.actual_result: You can see that both Light and Dark theme are selected, and you cannot switch themes anymore, unless you close Appearance and open again
data.expected_result: Both theme and sync options should switch normally
data.short_description: If you change theme and toggle off the "Sync across clients" switch at the same time, both themes will be checked and you cannot switch themes anymore until settings is reopen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings > Appearance - Make sure Sync across client is ON (won't work if it's already OFF) - Change the theme (aka the unselected option), and toggle OFF the switch at the exact same time
